comment: Does exactly what I want to do, which is to toggle the song mode easily from my watch. Only suggestions I have is to be able to view the current state/volume of the ringer, and to be able to control ringer volume as well from the watch.

comment: It worked great originally, but then stopped.  Probably Android version issue, but on my Samsung Galaxy Note 4 with Android 5.1.1, it doesn't seem to work unless the phone is unlocked.

reply.author: Business Slacks
reply.content: It's good to know I'm not alone!

author: Michael G
comment: Can we get a theme there all the ring tones are on one page?
title: All in one.

author: Taylor Peterson
comment: It might sound strange but after installing this app, I went the entire day without being able to use my moble data connection on my Verizon network. I checked everything that could have been wrong, reset the phone multiple times, but it wasn't until I uninstalled this app and reset the phone that the function came back. I have reinstalled the app and my data is currently working so we will see if the issue repeats itself.

reply.author: Business Slacks
reply.content: It sounds like you are experiencing a weird connectivity issue with your device that is completely unrelated to this application. If you view Ringtone Remote's required permissions you will see that it only requires access to your device's vibration motor. It does not have the ability to modify or even view any of your network settings.

title: Broke my data on HTC One M8

author: Ken Torok
comment: Simple utility.  Does exactly what I need it to do.  I wanted the ability to set my phone to vibrate or silent without taking my phone out of my pocket.  Also like that setting phone to vibrate is confirmed by a short vibrate from the phone.  Similarly, restoring phone to normal will be confirmed by default notification sound.
title: Perfect!

comment: This app is awesome. At first I had trouble with starting it via voice on my watch but then I got the hang of it and it works every time now.
title: Moto 360

author: Dew Alam
comment: Just one issue— there is no visual confirmation if a command has successfully gone through. Most   Android Wear apps display a check mark to confirm when an option is executed. Please add this here in the next update.

reply.author: Business Slacks
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! I just published v2.0 to the Google Play store and it includes the visual confirmation that you requested.

title: Perfecto

comment: I like the idea of this app but when I download on my phone I get nothing on my watch. Maybe need some better instructions on how to use or maybe there is an issue.

reply.author: Business Slacks
reply.content:
If your phone is paired with an Android Wear powered smart watch then the companion application should automatically be installed. Here is a list of all of the current Android Wear powered devices: http://goo.gl/idyghb

If your device is not on that list then you have a device that is not compatible with Ringtone Remote.
